mapper.insert: insert into tax_cal (salescode, slipdate, supplyvalue, salesstatus, deptcode, surtax, ordercode, clientcode) values (#{salescode},sysdate,#{supplyvalue},#{salesstatus} ,#{deptcode},#{surtax},#{ordercode},#{clientcode})
mapper.select: select salescode, slipdate, supplyvalue, salesstatus, deptcode, surtax, ordercode, clientcode from tax_cal
select salescode, slipdate, supplyvalue, salesstatus, deptcode, surtax, ordercode, clientcode from tax_cal where salescode = #{salescode}
